page.title: 17LETTON ROAD NURSERIES
page.content: {Letton Road Nurseries}covers 5 acres. It includes 4 green-houses and 6 plastic tunnels. It mainly grows salad vegetables such as cucumbers, tomatoes lettuces and green peppers. They also grow house plants. The produce is distributed locally with unsold plants ending up on the compost heap. Most of the plants are grown from seeds, and geraniums and fuschias are started from cuttings. They are grown in seed trays, pots and soil blocks. The plants are watered by irrigation sprinklers. The water comes from a bore-hole because water pressure is too low locally to operate the system. The largest greenhouse is 11,600sq.ft. and is cooled by solar-sensitive automatic ventilators. They employ 1 full-time and 2 part-time workers with children helping at weekends.
